alluxio.master.file

Class PermissionChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • alluxio.master.file.PermissionChecker

  • @NotThreadSafe
public final class PermissionChecker
extends Object
    Base class to provide permission check logic.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PermissionChecker(InodeTree inodeTree)
      Constructs a PermissionChecker instance for Alluxio file system.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkParentPermission(Mode.Bits bits, LockedInodePath inodePath)
      Checks whether a user has permission to perform a specific action on the parent of the given path; if parent directory does not exist, treats the closest ancestor directory of the path as its parent and checks permission on it.
      void checkPermission(Mode.Bits bits, LockedInodePath inodePath)
      Checks whether a user has permission to perform a specific action on a path.
      void checkSetAttributePermission(LockedInodePath inodePath, boolean superuserRequired, boolean ownerRequired)
      Checks whether a user has permission to edit the attribute of a given path.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PermissionChecker

        public PermissionChecker(InodeTree inodeTree)
        Constructs a PermissionChecker instance for Alluxio file system.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • checkParentPermission

        public void checkParentPermission(Mode.Bits bits,
                                  LockedInodePath inodePath)
                           throws AccessControlException,
                                  InvalidPathException
        Checks whether a user has permission to perform a specific action on the parent of the given path; if parent directory does not exist, treats the closest ancestor directory of the path as its parent and checks permission on it. This check will pass if the path is invalid, or path has no parent (e.g., root).
        Parameters:
        bits - bits that capture the action Mode.Bits by user
        inodePath - the path to check permission on
        Throws:
        AccessControlException - if permission checking fails
        InvalidPathException - if the path is invalid

      • checkPermission

        public void checkPermission(Mode.Bits bits,
                            LockedInodePath inodePath)
                     throws AccessControlException,
                            InvalidPathException
        Checks whether a user has permission to perform a specific action on a path. This check will pass if the path is invalid.
        Parameters:
        bits - bits that capture the action Mode.Bits by user
        inodePath - the path to check permission on
        Throws:
        AccessControlException - if permission checking fails
        InvalidPathException - if the path is invalid

      • checkSetAttributePermission

        public void checkSetAttributePermission(LockedInodePath inodePath,
                                        boolean superuserRequired,
                                        boolean ownerRequired)
                                 throws AccessControlException,
                                        InvalidPathException
        Checks whether a user has permission to edit the attribute of a given path.
        Parameters:
        inodePath - the path to check permission on
        superuserRequired - indicates whether it requires to be the superuser
        ownerRequired - indicates whether it requires to be the owner of this path
        Throws:
        AccessControlException - if permission checking fails
        InvalidPathException - if the path is invalid
